attributes.action: Save Tinsley Towers (next to the M1 near Sheffield)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Set up to fight the destruction of one of Yorkshires most iconic landmarks.

The location of the towers is next to the M1 near Sheffield. In fact the M1 curves around them as you drive past them. For years these have been a welcome site to people driving on the M1.

The owners (Eon owners of Powergen) have gone against public opinion and decided to put profits before the wishes of the people of Yorkshire. Of course if you are a customer of the firm (as in gas and electricity) you may think wise to change to a different supplier to show your protest.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
